title: YOUR SHOP Refresh Button
body: Having a 1 use Your Shop refresh would be rather useful for if you get skins you don't like

replies.body:
These shops are tailored to the champs you play (and those similar), aren't all that infrequent, and offer massive discounts which there is absolutely no obligation to provide.

I like free stuff as much as the next person, but the game is already free to play, they can only offer so much other stuff at free or high discount.
